CustomField.description: Description: NICC-051009; NICC-057681; Displays the total hours from the field "Total Time (24 hr, rollup summary)" in hours and minutes
CustomField.formula: TEXT(FLOOR( TotalTime24HrRollup__c )) + ' h ' + TEXT( FLOOR( ( ROUND(TotalTime24HrRollup__c,2)-FLOOR(TotalTime24HrRollup__c) ) * 60 ) ) + ' min'
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Rollup summary of the Status Time Elapsed from all Status Tracking records minus excluded Statuses
CustomField.label: Total Time Status Tracking (hh:mm)
